enWisdom: The slip-ups of an ignorant person are excusable
Every ignorant person is prone to temptation
Many a revered person has been humiliated by his ignorance
For the ignorant there is loss in every situation
One who is ignorant is disregarded [by others]

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَطَارَهُ [مَنِ اسْتَظْهَرَهُ‏] الْجَهْلُ فَقَدْ عَصَى الْعَقْلَ
enWisdom: One who gets uplifted by ignorance has opposed the intellect
The disbeliever did not disbelieve until he became ignorant

Wisdom: الْعَامِلُ بِجَهْلٍ كَالسَّائِرِ عَلَى غَيْرِ طَرِيقٍ فَلَا يَزِيدُهُ جِدُّهُ فِي السَّيْرِ إِلَّا بُعْداً عَنْ حَاجَتِهِ
enWisdom: The one who acts with ignorance is like one who is travelling on the wrong path, so his effort in moving forward adds nothing for him but distance from his goal

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ لَمْ تُحَصِّلُوا بِالْجَهْلِ أَرْباً وَلَنْ تَبْلُغُوا بِهِ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ سَبَباً وَلَنْ تُدْرِكُوا بِهِ مِنَ الْآخِرَةِ مَطْلَباً
enWisdom: Verily you will not attain any goal by ignorance, nor will you achieve any goodness by means of it, nor will you realize any of your wishes in the Hereafter through it
The ignorance of a youth is excused and his knowledge is undermined
Many an ignorance is better than forbearance (or knowledge)
Many an ignorant person is saved by his ignorance

Wisdom: لَوْ أَنَّ الْعِبَادَ حِينَ جَهِلُوا وَقَفُوا لَمْ يَكْفُرُوا وَلَمْ يَضِلُّوا
enWisdom: If the servants were to stop when they are ignorant [about something], they would neither apostatize nor would they go astray
